---
title: "Cumultative Frequencies"
output: html_notebook
---

For each given value x determine the number of values in the list of observations that are less than or equal to x <br>
It holds: H(x) = h(a1) + h (a2) + ... + h(aj) <br>
For the relative cumultative frequency distribution it holds: <br>
F(x) = f(a1) + f(a2) + ... + f(aj) <br>
